          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Propagation of light rays in a graded-index fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausbreitung der hellen Strahlen in einer 
Gradientenfaser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation des rayons légers dans une fibre 
graded-index</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propagação de raios claros em uma fibra 
graded-index</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Propagazione dei raggi luminosi in una fibra 
graded-index</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση των ελαφριών ακτίνων σε μια ίνα 
βαθμολογώ-ευρετηρίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Propagación de rayos ligeros en una fibra 
graded-index</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows light rays travelling inside a graded-index fibre propagating in a sine wave path.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fibre types</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">graded-index fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">graded-index multimode glass fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">modal dispersion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optic fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sine wave path</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die hellen Strahlen, die 
innerhalb einer Gradientenfaser reisen, die in einem Sinuswelle Pfad 
fortpflanzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les rayons légers 
voyageant à l'intérieur d'une fibre graded-index propageant dans une
voie d'accès de vague de sinus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os raios claros que 
viajam dentro de uma fibra graded-index que propaga em um trajeto da 
onda do seno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i raggi luminosi che 
viaggiano all'interno di una fibra graded-index che si propaga in un 
percorso dell'onda di seno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ελαφριές ακτίνες που 
ταξιδεύουν μέσα σε μια ίνα βαθμολογώ-ευρετηρίων διαδίδοντας σε 
ένα μονοπάτι κυμάτων ημιτόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los rayos ligeros que 
viajan dentro de una fibra graded-index que propaga en un camino de la
onda del seno.</string>
          </description>
